attributes.action: Stop Claims and Payments of All Benefits for All Non UK Nationals
attributes.additional_details:
All Non UK Nationals should be banned from claiming any type of benefits with immediate effect.

Responsible department: Department for Work and Pensions.

This petition requests that all Non UK nationals, including those from the European Union, should be immediately banned from claiming and receiving any type of benefit including:

Jobseeker's Allowance
Housing Benefit
Winter Fuel Payments
Disability Benefits
Social Housing
Working Tax credits
Child Tax Credits
Child Benefit
Child Care / Child Minder Allowance
Free Travel and Transport Allowances
Free School Meals
Carers Allowance
Free Healthcare
Free Schooling
